title: queues not popping up
body:
Hey folks

I have a problem with the launcher, in the way that sometimes it says that i am disconnected even though i have internet. And the queues are not popping up leading to queue-ban. And when i finally get into champselect( not very often) it just freezes up and i cant pick a champ or see the chat. 
I have tried everything on this site --> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664 <--

If anyone can help it would be great

replies.body: Well thats the thing when i get into the game in works fine, it is just the launcher there is something wrong with. I have no lag in-game

If troubleshooting your network wasn't able to help at all, it almost makes me wonder if you're having issues with packet loss. Let's do a quick test for that by using your latest network logs from a game that lagged, and pop them into our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743). grab a screenshot of what it gives you after scanning them, and post it here for me to take a look at.
